meanings.definition: The quality or state of being mischievous or playful.
meanings.sent1: Her prankishnesses always brought laughter to the classroom.
meanings.sent2: The children's prankishnesses brightened up the dull afternoon.
meanings.sent3: His prankishnesses during recess made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: The kitten's playful prankishnesses kept the household entertained.
meanings.sent5: The prankishnesses of the puppy were endearing to all who met him.

meanings.definition: Actions or behavior that are characterized by playful or mischievous intent.
meanings.sent1: The siblings' prankishnesses often led to giggles and fun.
meanings.sent2: The prankishnesses of the group of friends made the party unforgettable.
meanings.sent3: Their prankishnesses at the park made the day more enjoyable.
meanings.sent4: The prankishnesses of the students added a sense of humor to the classroom.
meanings.sent5: The cat's prankishnesses kept the household on their toes.
